website_summaries.verdict: This low-priced hole punch works well and has a sturdy metal design that is likely to last for years.
pros: If you're on a budget but aren’t willing to sacrifice performance, this punch is a good option for smaller jobs
Its capacity is limited to 12 pages, but the lever is easy to use and requires little effort
The price and size of this punch make it ideal for classrooms or home offices
cons: There is no guide to align paper, so you have to eyeball each punch
This may only be an issue if you're punching more than 12 pages, however

customer_reviews.title: Great hole punch except for one problem
customer_reviews.text: Great hole punch except for one problem. There is no guide to align the paper. If you plan to put your punched paper into a binder the pages won't align with each other. Good punches usually have a moveable guide that you can move up and down so all hole punches are property aligned. A 'work around' for this punch is slightly fold your paper you are about to punch with a crease at the half-way point on the edge you will be putting into the punch. Align the crease with the center black guide, then punch. All you sheets will be identically punched.
customer_reviews.author: bakerlady

customer_reviews.title: Last hole punch you will need
customer_reviews.text: Take the punch out of the box, remove two clips that hold down the lever for shipping and you are ready to go. Punches holes with minimal effort and looks great. The holes are cleanly cut and there is a paper alignment on one end so every time you punch the holes will be in the same place. I like having papers in my binder line up so this is a big plus. Also comes with a lifetime warranty so no need to ever purchase another punch.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hole Puncher
customer_reviews.text: The hole puncher was confusing at first. It turns out you have to push paper to the left, which has a small edge to place it against. So, that centers the paper to punch holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Starks

customer_reviews.title: No alignment capabilities
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a guide on this when punching pages; so it's very easy, over time, to have misaligned pages in a binder. I wish I had bought a more expensive version with an alignment setting.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Grey Mist

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the other people are talking about where you can't get the pages to all have the same holes in the same place apparently there not paying attention there's a Ledge on either side that you put the paper up against and if you do that your three-wing binder will have pages in it that are all edge-to-edge
customer_reviews.author: Edward W.

customer_reviews.title: Great leverage
customer_reviews.text: Works great! You're limited to pretty small stacks of paper, but that's to be expected. There's plenty of leverage, so even with my tendonitis I don't find it difficult to cut through paper. The holding compartment is pretty easy to take off; just make sure you're careful so you don't flip paper bits all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: H. Grove (errantdreams)

customer_reviews.title: No paper stop to align holes from page to page
customer_reviews.text: This is really a heavy duty punch for the money. I don't care for it because there is no paper stop so the holes in pages from one punch do not align with the next pages punched. If that doesn't matter, this may very well be the paper punch for you. I purchased a different paper punch. Not worth the hassle and $ to return.
customer_reviews.author: javafool in Indiana

customer_reviews.title: As good as/better than the old days!
customer_reviews.text: I just created my home office and needed to buy a lot of items. I purchased this based on the reviews and the great price point. I also based it on my memory of Bostich products from my college days (I still have my old Bostich staplers)...this hole punch was every bit as sturdy and well made as they used to be (unlike so many other brand names) It even punched more than the recommended 12 sheet limit :)
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Effortless punching pressure and SHARP
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the ease of use. The punches are sharp and will go through multiple sheets of paper easily. I have other punches that I plan on tossing after this purchase. No more slamming down on my hands trying to get a couple of sheets of paper punched. UPDATE: I have now punched thousands of sheets of paper. I should have probably gotten a commercial puncher, But honestly, this one is still as sharp as the day I bought it. It works smoothly and easily, still far better than other more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Missycoo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this garbage!
customer_reviews.text: This puncher has what looks like lock shown in the image in both bottom and top holes. It seems this part is supposed to be horizontal. I tried to talk to Botitch customer tech support service twice and no luck. I gave up and decided to return it. I now must to go to Ups to return it and to a store and pick up one I can check out before I pay for it. I was trying to avoid leaving the house because of corona but no luck. With so many good they can afford to screw you over forever till the negatives start increasing to the point they affect the total score.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Useless junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on the good reviews and that it was listed as "Amazon's Choice" - unfortunately, what I got was junk. This thing constantly jammed. And I'm not talking on stacks of paper - it would regularly jam on a single sheet. I finally thought I had cleared the jams, and now the top portion broke apart from the bottom, and so the punches can't even be released. My paper is still stuck inside, which I am going to have to forcibly tear out in order to try and return this.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moser

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed
customer_reviews.text: I used this 3 times and only hole punched 2-5 sheets at a time. Went to use it today, it’s broken. Of course the return window is closed so now I am stuck with a broken hole punch. One of the punchers is stuck. Waste of money. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rosna Jean

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a three-hole punch for home use. This is mostly metal, other than the clip tray, which is plastic, and is better than the one we use at work. I'm not sure what other reviewers meant about it not aligning. When I put paper in it, there's a bumper at the bottom, and I put the paper against it. My papers are all even in the 3-ring notebooks. It says it can do 12 pages at a time, but the most I've done is 10, and that does seem to be it's limit. I'm printing on ordinary copier paper, probably a 20 pound weight of paper. I"m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hole Punch by Bostitch!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hole punch! I needed something for my home office and this punch is perfect. It does up to 12 sheets with no issues and minimal effort. It's super easy to align the papers into the punch and the chip tray is removable for easy disposal of the punched paper. My only complaint is that I wish it would come in different colors!! Overall nice job Bostitch!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa H

customer_reviews.title: Works well with careful alignment
customer_reviews.text: For what I wanted, this is a great three-hole punch. I'm not sure you can adjust it to a 2-hole punch like my past one from Acco, but that's not a big deal for me. The only improvement I see is that when I stick the papers in, there's no little piece of metal at the bottom to stop the papers and line them up evenly (if there is something, it's very small, not enough), so you have to guide it a bit to make sure the holes are in the right place rather than just sticking it in and having the bottom of the page sit on the metal tab to line it up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aly from Cali

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my downstairs office and just now used it (of course after return date - my bad) So it said up to 12 sheets of paper - sure 12 fit in there but it doesn't punch holes through them all. I literally had to force all my weight down on it to get through 8 sheets! The paper guide on the end will only accommodate a 6-8 sheets of paper too. So if you add more at a time, the sheets will ride over the top of the guide and the holes won't line up.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Adams-Maroo

customer_reviews.title: Great punch, DOES have a paper guide
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific 3-hole punch with sturdy metal construction and very sharp blades. Ignore the reviews saying it doesn't have a paper alignment stop. It does, and OF COURSE it does -- nobody makes 3-hole punches without paper alignment, because such a thing would be as useless as a styrofoam hammer. I don't want to call those reviewers dummies for not recognizing the raised lip on the left edge as being an alignment guide, but I have no idea what they were expecting to see.
customer_reviews.author: Riff Conner

customer_reviews.title: No Paper Guide
customer_reviews.text: There is no paper guide on this hole punch and the holes on the unit are not even spaced the same from the end of the unit so you have to guess how far from each end of the paper the holes should be placed. Spend a little more money and buy a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: carldinbend

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 3 hole punch for my home office. This one seems well made and so far no complaints after 6 months. It can do 12 pages at a time, but is better if only do 9-10 pages at time to make it easier. Unit is easy to clean out and I like that it is made of metal as will last.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Allyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in February, no issues with it at all. The holes were already aligned for 3 hole binder. As I make up the binders for multiple stations, I am forever using this puncher. It has a paper catcher at bottom, so no confetti flying around. Since I left the one I bought with employees, I am buying 2 more! Good deal. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WiseSam

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few days...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a few days and Clip fell out. Worked great until then, but I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Dadew1

customer_reviews.title: Its a boss of a home hole punch. BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: So I caught this on a flash sale, reviews are so so and I nearly ordered a more expensive unit. I ended up taking a chance and it worked out well. This is a good hole punch. Will it punch a hole thru 40 sheets? No. But it easily goes thru 6 sheets without any effort. Im more than happy with it. I have a mondo punch at the office, but for the occasional need, this works just perfect. Its stuurdy, steel components feel good in the hand. What are you waiting on?
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Hall

customer_reviews.title: Punch works great and YES it does have a lip on one end which acts as an edge guide.
customer_reviews.text: Before this I had a cheap plastic punch that was a real chore to use. This punches clean holes in several sheets at a time with little effort. This is well built and won't break the bank. Several reviewers have complained that there is no paper guide to insure hole alignment but YES THERE IS!!! There is a raised lip on one end that serves to align all papers the same.
customer_reviews.author: Batman2

customer_reviews.title: It won’t work and three-quarter inch plywood, possibly anything thicker than 1/16 of an ounce?
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say this little man gadget makes some great holes in paper it’s not much good for three-quarter inch plywood but it will put holes in paper. Yeah I think somethings broken underneath there but I think there’s some wheels broken under there but yeah in the hour you can’t get it to latch Oops Well regardless it’s a great whole puncher and now you know about my broken door so enjoy your whole bunch it’s a super fun and I think it’s great even though I’ve never used it because I bought it for my daughter but I had one like it once and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: JOHN HAUGMO

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Since we are all thrown into homeschooling, I’m doing my best to stay organized. This hole punch is great! It was priced the best so I purchased it. I can’t imagine paying more for something any better. If I had a full classroom maybe but it’s just my 1 kiddo so not too pressed. I feel like this will last for years! The bottom is a rubber or silicone material and it comes off to dump paper clippings. I give it 5 stars and I do recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gavins Mommy

customer_reviews.title: It works, but why so scratched?
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but I am not sure the one I received was new. The silver top part was severely scratched up, like it had been dragged on concrete. So either previously abused, or a manufacturing defect plus a severe lack of quality control. Not an item I would want in my office. I have office accessories that have been used for more than 30 years that look much better than this.
customer_reviews.author: sweetmustard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was the most inexpensive three-hole punch I could find and I was surprised by how well it works. You can't stack a TON of paper in it but it was enough to punch through my 10-15 pages of notes for each of my class sections. Don't be stupid like me and miss the little metal tab at one end where where you line up the paper to punch it in the right spot. I wasn't a fan at first because I thought it didn't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Missing the most important feature
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well built hole punch. The glaring problem is that there is no guide for the paper AND its not adjustable. 99% of the paper I want to punch holes in is 8.5 x 11. With my old hole punch I slide the paper against the paper guide and boom...perfection. Here I have to mark the paper against the binder to indicate where the holes should be and then do my best to align it in the hole punch. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: BSbabe

customer_reviews.title: Organize for college
customer_reviews.text: The weight of this is pretty good as to say this is not some cheap item that going to break with a couple of uses. This item is good to keep your stuff organized especially when in college. College gives you many papers that you want to maintain clean and un wrinkled. This hole puncher and a ringed folder is the answer. Love this it has given me no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jjpalacioss

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, clean cuts
customer_reviews.text: Started using the hole punchers for a busy book with paper that had been laminated. I placed a stack of four papers and had to put a little force into, but it did the job. Good hole puncher.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Does 4-5 pgs at a time—Lacks efficiency
customer_reviews.text: Bummed. It honestly only does maybe 4-5 sheets at a time, unless maybe your pages are BIBLE-thin! Funny they wrote that it can do 12 pages at a time! 12 was o v e r l y AMBITIOUS, to say the least. If you are an intellect that needs to punch a fair amount of paper, this just is not efficient—especially if you have anything important to do with your life. Hope I saved some of you some time. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: dustan & shaila

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it 4.5 stars, if given the option
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good 3-hole punch. I'd give it 4.5 stars, if given the option. It seems well built and easy to use. It does have a metal lip on the one side to align the papers at the bottom. That metal lip works well for alignment, although it would be nice if it were a little taller & more pronounced, just to give a little more confidence that the paper isn't going to go over it without realizing it (which hasn't happened yet).
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but not great. Holes don't align well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not 100% happy with this hole puncher. It does what is supposed to but unfortunately if you use the little ledge guide that it has the holes are not properly aligned. They're a little lower than they should be so your paper will stick out a little bit from the binder or folder you're using. It doesn't have a way to adjust the holes position or a ruler as a guide either to align the holes better. That is why I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Weird design
customer_reviews.text: I never use this type of hole punch before. I work in an office environment, and we use regular office three hold punch. I bought this one for home use. It works, but the design is weird, difficult to figure which way to insert the papers, even more difficult to center the paper since there is no ruler or way to center the paper. It works, but I would not recommend it. Spend a couple more bucks and get a better hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: Player20190101

customer_reviews.title: Bostitch Office 3-hole Punch
customer_reviews.text: Works well and snaps back. I did get it stuck once because I punched out some soft plastic that jammed it. I just took a skinny screw driver and gave it a little hit with a small hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty. Works great with plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty 3 hole punch. I use it to punch holes in plastic sleeves. I trim off the built in holes of the sleeves so the pages will reveal the labels, so I have to repunch then all. With papers inside the sleeves, I can fit 4-5 at a time, which is great becasue the sleeves are thicker than paper. The puncher is lightweight and easy to use. I dropped a star only because I don't like the holding chamber for the scraps, but that isn't just this one, it's all punchers.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Punches holes.
customer_reviews.text: Very good! I would definitely recommend if you are in the market for a hole puncher. It is well built, comes from a reputable company, has a lifetime warranty, is pretty easy to use once you figure out how, nice, and comes with a good price. TLDR: No regrets, and would recommend -- -Just An Amazon Customer
customer_reviews.author: Just an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but can only do a few pages
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cannot go through a dozen pages. I actually broke a tiny piece off the first time I used it and I was only doing about 7 pages. It still works, but really cannot do more than 3-4 pages at a time. It’s good enough for what I use it for, but wouldn’t recommend it if you need to punch holes in a lot of paper.
customer_reviews.author: SaraSoda

customer_reviews.title: Good Functional Punch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for use with home schooling and it works fine. Unlike some reviews said, mine does have a guide for lining up pages. It works well. Since the description says it punches 12 pages, I counted out twelve just to test it. It does work, but I had to put my weight into it a bit because I'm not very strong. Overall, it seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Great quality, easy to use, good size
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I honestly thought the quality would be "not-so-great" whenever I ordered the hole punch due to it being so cheap, but I was ok with that since i would only be using it once or twice a month. However, it arrived today and I LOVE it! Great quality, good size, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Martin

customer_reviews.title: This is the Hole Punch to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on any other Hole Punch. This holds up very well and is sturdy. The paper doesn't get stuck and hole punches a decent amount of sheets. It is not flimsy like many I have tried and I keep it handy to hole- punch all kinds of material. It works well on card stock, too. The fasteners stay in place and I would totally recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: P W

customer_reviews.title: Great little hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Chip tray comes off, so you can clean it completely. Simple, sturdy, reliable, and it looks nice too--small profile. I don't need to punch a lot at once.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Can't even insert the paper!
customer_reviews.text: The three punches are secured by heavy metal bolts which keep them fixed to the bottom of the punch, with no way to insert the paper. There is no obvious way to remove the bolts (pliers?) and no directions. I'm probably just going to throw it out, as the hassle of sending it back is hardly worth it for the price. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Punches through several sheets at once, just don't get carried away. Also there's a mark on the base that makes it very easy to line the pages up so that they all match. I was able to punch 300+ pages (a few sheets at a time) and have them all line up almost perfectly in the binder.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: This 3-hole punch is perfect for my home office. Very well made and does the job perfectly. I'm glad I read the questions and answers because I didn't know about the raised lip on one end which makes the holes line up in the same place each time. Great value for the price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KarenG

customer_reviews.title: Great Hole Punch! Give the holes that i need
customer_reviews.text: looking for hole punch for my home office, i ordered this from Amazon since it has good price, unfortunately the first one arrived with damaged, the small black tab the lock the top piece came off. Amazon shipped the replace one quickly. I have used it and it punched the holes well and cut holes easily. the hole punch is light weight and strong build in structure. I like that it has the black rubber tray to catch the small pieces after cut holes. i wish this hole punch can do like 15 pages or more at a time but it will be tough to push in and press. for the price it is still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Vong

customer_reviews.title: Broke within an hour
customer_reviews.text: I did not use this hole puncher for any type of "heavy duty" hole punching. But, within the first 30 minutes of use, the top became dislodged from the bottom and one of the spring loaded hole punch jammed. Try a different manufacturer. This product is not a wise purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for WFH
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra during this great pandemic as all my work supplies are in the office. I'm surprised at the price and quality of this hole puncher. Its quite durable for under $10, and a necessity when youre organising in binders. Thumbs up! A good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: WanderingStar

customer_reviews.title: Nice for at home use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for online school. It’s works well for home use. Fits about 5 pages of computer paper at a time so I wouldn’t buy it if you frequently need to hole punch big stacks of paper. Works well for all my bio PowerPoint packets.
customer_reviews.author: Aero

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch works like it should. The 12 sheet capacity is fine for what I use it for. I would recommend this for anyone looking for a hole punch to use for note keeping in college classes or a hobbyist. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D'Amore

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't need the item at least once?
customer_reviews.text: I have so many of these but they're all are in storage. Being too lazy to go through my boxes to find them I opted to buy a new one. And I'm lad. This is better than the ones I already have. Built very well, makes clean holes. Very satisfied with this item!
customer_reviews.author: rjf

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that I could use to punch holes in my music, so that I could put it in notebooks. This works very well, takes a minimal amount of effort, stores easily, empties easily, and was well-priced. Would totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SeaDuck

customer_reviews.title: 3 hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a limited time deal for prime members. It arrived on time undamaged. It easily punches holes in paper without leaving little paper dots attached, they all go into the collection tray underneath. I cringed as it hit the floor the day after I got it, but it held up and still works.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the process of organizing some paperwork and files and knew I needed something like this. This is very sturdy and I'm happy with it. My fiance also uses it so he can put his school work in a binder. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jillyn31

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this three whole punch! Is small, compact, and light weight perfect for on the road and wow does it produce a great punch!
customer_reviews.author: Jenkris

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. My old puncher would only punch about 3 sheets, the bottom kept falling off and did not align the paper correctly all the time. THIS puncher corrected all the issues with my old one that is now in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Jpink

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use in my classroom, and it is serving it’s purpose well. It’s sturdy and durable, yet easy to use. It looks nice and the package is slimline enough that you can keep it in for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy 3-hole punch - it’s a good one
customer_reviews.text: Easy to press & punches cleanly through a good chunk of paper. Feels solid/sturdy - not cheapo material. I expect it will last as long as I have it. It is what it is - a solid 3-hole punch. My only issue with it is the little chads don’t always go into the bottom & I get annoyed when I’m picking up tiny circles off the floor. First world problems 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It's a 3 hole puncher that works as a 3 hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: There is not much more to say about a 3 hole punch. Does it punch 3 holes better than other 3 hole punchers? No... well maybe. I have not taken time to test all of the 3 hole punchers in the world. This works as intended. It is sturdy and gets the job done. It is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: the paper guide is easy to use and the puncher worked with ease! saw some negative reviews but the guide is there on the right and easy to set paper against. the part that collects the paper punched is easy to remove , it is the rubber base at bottom. Very happy with my purchase and it came very fast with Amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Our homeschool program requires a lot of hole punching and this hole punch is getting the job done. It is sturdy and feels very durable. I am satisfied with this purchase and I can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great 3-hole Punch!
customer_reviews.text: This hole puncher is great! It does what it says... punches three holes in paper! It holds a decent about of paper at a time, I normally just do max 5 sheet at a time. I've only had it for a short time, but it is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product worked fine. I was confused at first when I was trying to open it. Thank God for You Tube.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. This is sturdy with a easy to use hole punch. It creates clear three holes.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: okay 3-hole punch, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay 3-hole punch--however, it does not have a feature that holds paper in a manner that allows each piece to be punched consistently in the same place. For that reason, I exchanged it for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Well enough for 10 sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough for my needs, just use for up to 10 sheets. It seems gonna be last for years! My lessons learned for other pole punches which i owned, was never upload more than sheet capability!
customer_reviews.author: MNG

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This item works perfect for my needs. I am a nurse that has to record medications given on home care patients and it can punch holes through many med sheets for my patients charts.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Couture

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy & punches well. Easy to use. Good alignment edge so they all punch at the same place. The best part is the rubber tray that holds the debris doesn't let the punched paper fall out and go all over the place. I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Into Details

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely. Lines up my paper and punches the holes nicely. Works exactly as described. Highly recommend if you're a college student trying to get organized! Especially in quarantine during the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship & quality.
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and SURPRISE! Here's your broken hole punch. Never even got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: RDG

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Product does have a plastic lip that works as a paper alignment.The alignment method is not perfect but for the price this can't be beat. I just have to be a little more conscious about making sure the papers are all aligned. No issues hole punching one sheet or 12 sheets at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what binder this is for, but the holes don't work for my paper or the new binder.. It isn't even close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like school days
customer_reviews.text: My wife, a retired school teacher, used to use a paper hole punch like this in school. Come to think of it, i used one as a kid... Very useful and very well built.
customer_reviews.author: ahalp

customer_reviews.title: New School, new needs
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a good long lasting stable hole puncher. It works well , the grip on the table is very good and can easily punch holes have tried max 10 pages and worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: amtu

customer_reviews.title: Great little hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: This little baby is a workhorse! It punches through many sheets of paper with ease and I used it to make several folders for classes without any issues. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to do 8-12
customer_reviews.text: So smooth and nice when you just do one or a few, have to try pretty hard to get it through 10 though and I'm a big boy. Would recommend UNLESS you need to regularly do fat stacks. If you regularly do one at a time it's great.
customer_reviews.author: JCEE

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have used this already and it served its purpose. I did have to limit the number of pages, as indicated in the description. The holes punched in the same place every time thanks to the page guide. The punched out dots were neatly contained in the bottom and easy to trash.
customer_reviews.author: Watson Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Decided to print out recipes and crochet patterns, and store them in a notebook. Needed a hole-puncher and found this. Great item, fair price. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 57cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for light work BUT!
customer_reviews.text: The holes are a bit too small around. Smaller than other hole punches I have used.
customer_reviews.author: KWC

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sharp, and precise
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and price, holes are neat and perfectly cut. To get it to work, remove the 2 black plastic clips that keep it locked. Those are hard to remove, so don't scratch the puncher or hurt yourself. There is a small ledge at one end of the puncher to position the paper so all the holes are at the same distance from the paper margin every time. I wish this info was in the instructions, if any came with it, otherwise it a great product.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.M.C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use.
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little to figure out it has a guide ledge as it's not really noticeable at first. It gets the job done. I don't got throwing in a full load of paper to punch all the time because it's not for commercial use. But well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: El 1.0

customer_reviews.title: Study and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried at first because the package seemed a little small so I thought I had ordered for the wrong size port, but upon testing it it works perfectly. It feels sturdy and nice and does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods?
customer_reviews.text: Received today. Opened the package, which was visibly undamaged.... and the unit literally fell apart in my hands. Seems like it wasn't properly assembled in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Heather V Milnthorp

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy to push down, reliable
customer_reviews.text: I got this great hole puncher for the office using returns credit. It is the best hole punch ever, which, if you have to do a bunch of reports for binders, you will appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: kristine k

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Works great for 10-15 pages at a time. Nice and compact compared to those lever ones that you have to pull over. Same function as more expensive ones from OfficeMax or staples but at a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: A REAL BARGAIN
customer_reviews.text: The price I paid was excellent and it works like its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: KARAOKEJUNKIE

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth action...
customer_reviews.text: This item is worth way more than it cost. I was concerned about ease of use due to carpal tunnel in my wrists. But, this hole punch goes thru multiple pages of paper like butter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brogdon

customer_reviews.title: Punches quick and easy on the hands.
customer_reviews.text: I'm newly retired and have a ton of papers to organize. I thought it would work best for me to put them into binders. This Bostitch hole punch is sturdy and easy to punch groups of paper. Makes this an easy job.
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but youno egge liner to line up sheets of paper evenly. Does punch holes good for notebook. But if you so a few sheets of paper and than want to do it again it is hard to line the paper up at the right spot to get the same hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: dnvolley

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy & east to use hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new hole punch & this did the trick. It’s not heavy but it’s sturdy. There is a removable panel that catches the punched out paper.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: This 3 hole punch surpasses 3-4 others I have used in the past. It punches the holes cleanly. I have not tested the 12 page capacity but it has worked well with 3-4 sheets and it is easier to properly place the pages before punching.
customer_reviews.author: mjm

customer_reviews.title: Holes out of line
customer_reviews.text: The holes are not aligned. I received 2 different hole punches assuming the first one was a one-off error. It was not. The three holes will not align with a piece of paper and you can't make even hole punches. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was sketchy about buying this, but after having used it, I found out that it works really great! I have only used on 4 pieces of paper at a time but it works perfectly for lining and I did not have to push more than once.
customer_reviews.author: PollyAné Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: The hole puncher came broke initially, but I contacted amazon and they were very quick to send me a replacement. I received the the second one it was (thankfully) not broken. It’s not the best quality but it’s good for the price. I’d recommend it if you don’t do much hole punching
customer_reviews.author: Luca Truex

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly well
customer_reviews.text: As school is shut down due to the coronavirus teacher's have sent paperwork to my daughter. I bought this for her paper's, and it works very well. I'm reading the reviews about it doesn't have a paper guide. It actually has a stopping point where the papers are no longer able to slide and further. So it does! The alignment lines up perfectly well as well. Im not sure why people have complaints? As a matter of fact at a school that I work out the office manager buys these for teacher's.
customer_reviews.author: My opinion!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t give up on it!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived broken, and was a huge piece of garbage at first. But after like an hour of man handling and wanting to throw it at the wall, I finally was able to fix the little thing and it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb and Madi

customer_reviews.title: Does not match the title
customer_reviews.text: I am not 100% satisfied with this puncher. Because you can only load 5 sheets or less at a time, otherwise the paper will jam. And the paper has no guides and the paper is not adjustable,so you will not be able to get exactly the same hole spacing on different papers.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla lawrence

customer_reviews.title: It wirks
customer_reviews.text: It works punched holes in stone paper and held up.
customer_reviews.author: Jakilyn driver

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This came broken out of the box. I had the use pliers to twist pieces back into place. Not very sturdy at all. I can only put 5 pieces of paper or less in at a time or it will jam. Not worth the money or the extra time it took to ship.
customer_reviews.author: adam l lancellotta

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just as described! It has some weight to it, which I appreciate. The bottom is easy to remove for a quick clean.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

product_meta.title: Bostitch Office HP12 3 Hole Punch, 12 Sheet Capacity, Metal,Silver
product_meta.description: Color:SilverCompact, metal three-hole punch for long lasting durability and reliable performance durable all-metal design delivers superior performance while the precision steel punch heads cleanly punch through up to 12 sheets of paper. Rubber base pad provides stability and desktop protection during use. Easy clean chip tray for maintaining a clean work environment. Punches in standard 3-hole configuration with 9/32” diameter holes. Lifetime limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Punches up to 12 sheets of paper
rubber base pad for stability during use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars7,798 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
